Great game to shut off your brain and play.

及其恶心的对抗机制，人类优势无限大。加上恶心人的四排语音交流，垃圾的屠夫技能，困难的升段条件，秒开的电机，一局游戏人类面都没见到就走了结果人家升段屠夫掉段。既然游戏这么偏向人类。为什么不把屠夫变成ai那？pve不好吗?玩屠夫的都是怨种呗，这个游戏环境，屠夫没人玩，人类拍不到人。迟早凉了这游戏。真是垃圾平衡。

"I think we've done, a pretty good job, so far" my ass!

In current state of things, regarding both the developers and the game, with all things considered after 600+ hours, I cannot recommend this game. You can play it for free, if you can keep away from the addiction and not spend any money, then go ahead and play. I urge you not to give them money until you see things turn around in terms of devs goals/attitude, game improvements, fight against cheaters, balancing, quality of life patches, improvements similar to mobile and many more. As long as they just keep working just for new chapters with no other changes this game will have a negative review from me. Player base can be pretty toxic, from what I hear and see, I'm glad I'm not in the top MMR. At least at lower skill levels you get new people that are not so toxic and you can have fun with.

Análise feita após 315 horas de jogo.

Simplesmente o jogo mais injusto, desbalanceado e frustrante que já joguei (e vi). Os killers do DBD são simplesmente uma piada. Basicamente você entra em uma partida (de killer) com 4 survivors sambando e rindo na sua cara, isso porque absolutamente TUDO no game é para ajudar os survivors (desde perks até os próprios poderes dos killers). Jogo sem seriedade nenhuma. Se você quiser jogar de killer, você terá que LITERALMENTE DEDICAR sua vida ao game, e mesmo assim tu ainda vai entrar na partida com 4 survs sambando, rindo, cagando e jogando a mer.da na sua cara. Vai chegar o dia em que os próprios survs vão poder se juntar e matar o killer K K K
Jogue de Nurse (Não carregue o 2° blink insta)
Toxicity is over the top these days. Better move to Evil Dead the game.
A really fun game

A great and very unique horror/survival game. One of the best in it's genre in my opinion. The gameplay is extremely tense and most of the time very scary. The atmosphere is unique too, and extremely good. It has a long learning curve it's true, but if you like games where you have to use your brain and logical thinking, Dead by Daylight gonna be your favourite. A true classic, I can only recommend it!

運営方針やパワーバランス、育成システムなどにおかしな点を感じる部分はあるが、ゲームシステム自体はとても画期的でとても面白い面はある。育成システム的に初心者はかなり苦戦を強いられると思うが、どのゲームでも最初下手だもんなってことで是非とも頑張っていただきたい。PS4とアカウント連携がないのでかなり課金しなければならない面もある。前述したようにゲームシステム自体は褒められる部分があるので、是非ともプレイしていただきたい。

Good game
Woman Repellent the Game

Game is terribly balanced. A full group of good survivors will destroy a killer no matter how good they are. That being said, the amount of survivors that are that good is a very small amount of the community and a lot of them play with each other. 

The other side of it is the killers just being able to no brain it and run people down. A lot of the killers have abilities that cancel out survivors only means of escape or create distance (Pallets and Windows) Thus rendering all potential of the chase dead, which is the only real fun the survivors get to have. That along with some just straight face camping people so their matches ends without any real gameplay can make it very frustrating to be a survivor. Nothing like a Bubba looking you dead in the eye hitting you with a hammer while you die on a hook. Most times at least one teammate is just sitting waiting for him to leave, which then stops gen progress, usually leading to everyone dying and him with a 4k. (Bubba isnt the only facecamper, just the most common one to do so. At least 50% of the ones I play against.)

If you're a casual player, or just not super good. Killer is the easier of the 2. You dont have to rely of anyone else, its just you and while some matches might go poorly, most will be you with a 3-4k along with more points.

There is a reason 90% of the twitch streamers are killer mains.

It's an awesome game but like most could use some tweeks here and there. I wish there was a way to combat people hacking but it is what it is. Overall I have a good time playing as some of my favorite slashers like Ghostface or Micheal Myers.

Ich weiß gar nicht wo ich anfangen soll. Zuallererst ist Game überhaupt nicht Anfänger freundlich. Ich meine was ist das für ein abgefucktes Ranking System. Man wird mit Überlebenden in eine Lobby gesteckt, die gefühlt gerade das Licht dieser Welt entdeckt haben. Total chaotisch und aussichtslos sich in solch einer Runde überhaupt Mühe zu geben. Bezüglich der Killer kann ich nun aus eigener Erfahrung sprechen (ca. 200 Spielstunden), dass manche einfach viel zu stark sind.  Z.B die Hexe hat eine unglaubliche Auto-Attack Range. Zu dem kann sie viel zu viele Markierungen setzen und dich mit ihrer Fähigkeit mühelos  in Grund und Boden fetzen. Dabei braucht sie nicht mal Skill. Des weiteren gibt es Survivors deren Perks echt sinnlos sind. Zum einem rede ich hier von Ace. Unglaublich cooler Char, aber die Perks könnt ihr in die Tonne kloppen. Bitte überarbeitet ihn. 

Ich hätte noch ziemlich viele Punkte, jedoch möchte ich das Game nicht all zu schlecht machen. Immerhin bin ich nach 280 Spielstunden immer noch dabei. Letztendlich kann ich euch nur einen Tipp ans Herz legen:
Müsst Ihr wissen
